summary: A tutorial to add your own shouts, with accompanying links to pdf and a gdoc for references to shouts. With downloads to the examples shown.
descriptionHtml:
A tutorial to add your own shouts, with accompanying links to pdf and a gdoc for references to shouts. With downloads to the examples shown.

Watch the tutorial video and make your own shouts! :)

Voice file extractor (fuz extractor)
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=950

Microsoft DirectX SDK (March 2009)
http://www.microsoft.com/download/en/details.aspx?id=3035

Audacity
http://audacity.sourceforge.net/download/

Youtube to MP3
http://www.youtube-mp3.org/

Best MP3 to wav site
http://media.io/

Fallout Mod Manager (to extract BSAs)
http://fallout3.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=640
author: jamiethe
